local_intent: After release onto red plate, verify red plate visibility, perform a controlled retreat of 0.1 m, and wait briefly to confirm clearance.
assumptions: White plate has been released onto the red plate prior to this subtree execution
Red plate remains visible for minimal perception check
Retreat distance 0.1 m corresponds to the safe clearance height in the global plan
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT's final retreat step in the transfer phase: perceives the red plate to confirm placement context, then retracts 0.1 m and waits briefly, matching the stepwise plan and success criteria for safe retreat.
